mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew_comment (comment_create_datetime, comment_text, user_info_user_no, crew_post_post_no, comment_usernick) VALUES (now(), #{comment_text}, #{user_info_user_no}, #{crew_post_post_no}, #{comment_usernick});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM crew_comment INNER JOIN user_info ON user_no = user_info_user_no WHERE crew_post_post_no=#{crew_post_post_no} ORDER BY crew_post_post_no ASC
SELECT * FROM crew_comment WHERE comment_no=#{comment_no} ORDER BY comment_no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE crew_comment SET user_info_user_no=null WHERE user_info_user_no=#{user_info_user_no};
